mapper.select: select user.username as username, user.bio as bio, user.avatar as avatar, user.fans_count as fans_count, user.follow_count as follow_count, IFNULL(!user_follow.is_del, 0) as following from user left join user_follow on user_follow.user_id = #{currentId} and user_follow.followed_user_id = #{userId} and user_follow.is_del = 0 where user.id = #{userId};
